Entry.Body:
New Voice and DW3305 Action Packs Available
Use the Add on Manager to install them
Voice Pack 10 adds on many new events to the voice system found in ED 3.3. It also allows you more control over text received voice output due to the additional text channels found in ED 3.3
DW3305 pack will download to your bookmarks the DW star systems and planet bookmarks. Use this in conjunction with your compass overlay to guide you accurately to offical meeting up points
Press the acknowledge button to never see this message again!
Good luck Commanders.
EDD Team.
****************************** Voice Pack 10.0.1.0 Out! Improved control over scan output over the 10.0.0.0 version ******************************
****************************** Please update to 10.4.3+ to fix a problem with a scan panel crash ******************************

Elite Galaxy Online
It has been brought to our attention that this service has been suspended, pending updates to it.
To help the commander who runs this site please disable this service in your commanders settings.
Go into Settings | Commanders, select your commander, click EDIT and then disable uploading of data to EGO by unsetting "Sync to EGO".
This will lower any load on his servers and also make EDD more happy!
Sorry for the interruption but we thought this was important.
We will inform you of any updates to this service when we are advised.
Safe Flight.
Rob and the EDD Team.

****************************** Update the program to 12.0.2 if you are going to play the Odyssey Alpha
Frontier have changed their method of marking journal files for this alpha and thus EDD will be confused and update your standard commander, instead of creating a commander with the prefix BETA
Once you update, your Odyssey play will be in the commander [BETA] name
Thanks ******************************
